Attributes.description: Concepts and processes for the strategic management of private sector, single and multi-business unit enterprises are analysed using the case method. Methodologies which draw on economic and organizational theory are integrated to form the foundations for strategic analyses.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of COMM 390, COMM 395 or (b) COMM 396. (Fourth-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 14:30, End Time: 16:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
